catalog_script_client.name: Choose a manager - OnLoad

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_89a95ee7935f6a1005b6367efaba1035
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Request Desktop or Laptop">5fc33510939ba25005b6367efaba1027</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Choose a manager - OnLoad</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below

    var mger = g_form.getValue('manager');
    
    if (mger === '') {
        // If the triggering field has no value
        message = 'You do not have a manager assigned, please choose one.';
        g_form.setReadOnly('manager', false);
        g_form.setMandatory('manager', true);
        g_form.showFieldMsg('manager', message, 'info');
	}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-17 18:26:25</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>89a95ee7935f6a1005b6367efaba1035</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Choose a manager - OnLoad</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="MyServiceDesk" source="x_1808462_mysdesk">bcb2fd1c935ba25005b6367efaba10ed</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="MyServiceDesk">bcb2fd1c935ba25005b6367efaba10ed</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_89a95ee7935f6a1005b6367efaba1035</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-18 21:40:48</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
